vision.notes: Likely possess vision, as they are ray-finned fish and no specific information suggests loss of sight. Further, they are popular game fish implying they can likely see lures/bait.

mechanoreception.notes: Likely possess a lateral line system for detecting water movement, common in ray-finned fishes.

chemoreception.notes: Likely possess chemoreception for detecting chemical cues in the water, which is important for finding food and mates.
